VIDEO
Video Source: BD-U
Video Codec: H.264/AVC
Video Resolution: 1920x1080p HD (16:9)
Video FPS: 23.976
Bit Depth: 10-bit
Chapters: Yes

AUDIO
Track 1: AAC 5.1 (English)
Track 2: AAC 2.0 (Japanese)
Track 3: AAC 2.0 (English Commentary)

SUBTITLES
Track 1: English Signs/Songs
Track 2: English Subtitles
Track 3: English Signs/Songs (Retail)
Track 4: English Subtitles (Retail)

NOTES
Encoded at CRF 16, with 0.95 VBR for practically lossless AAC. I resynced Commie's superior subtitles for the default sub track. However, Commie's karaoke subtitles are absolutely terrible, so I used my own modified version of Hybrid-Kaitou's subtitles for all of the songs. Enjoy!
